talksYaml.title: Another Look at Python Types
talksYaml.description: If you want to write expressive and accessible Python for the people you collaborate with, Python Types should definitely be in your arsenal. There has been a significant evolution to Pythonâ€™s support for types: Newer, more elegant syntax is available to help your code better communicate what its doing, and what your functions are returning. There has never been a better time to try out typing, or take a deeper look at newly available patterns.
